programme.title: The Eleven - Paradise Lost
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Investigators Lise Olsen and Fred Paige are on a mission to examine the confessions of inmate Edward Harold Bell. He has confessed to the brutal murder of eleven teenage girls. But is he a serial killer or just an attention-seeking liar?

programme.title: The Eleven - Russian Roulette
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 Prisoner Edward Harold Bell has retracted his confession. When investigators Lise Olsen and Fred Paige look into the only man ever convicted for any of the eleven murders, they uncover inconsistencies, unlawful police tactics and a miscarriage of justice.

programme.title: The Eleven - Motel Murder
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 With Edward Harold Bell as their number one suspect, investigators Lise Olsen and Fred Paige are determined to find justice for the eleven murdered girls of Galveston County

programme.title: The Eleven - No One Could Hear Her Scream
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 The discovery of physical evidence from a 46-year-old crime provides a possible DNA link and after a complicated search, investigators Lise Olsen and Fred Paige interview a woman who describes being kidnapped at gunpoint and raped by Edward Harold Bell.

programme.title: The Eleven - Killer on the Loose
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 Investigators Lise Olsen and Fred Paige head to Panama City where the investigation into Edward Harold Bell's lost years begins. They ultimately track down his former girlfriend. Will a message from the woman who loved him make Bell talk?

programme.title: The Eleven - Final Toll
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 With Edward Harold Bell's parole date quickly approaching, investigators Lise Olsen and Fred Paige face mounting pressure to find definitive proof that links him to the Eleven. The key question has Bell ever revealed anything only the killer would know?

programme.title: The First 48 - Deadly Premonition
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 1 After a young woman has a deadly premonition, the New Orleans homicide team discovers her killer may have killed before.

programme.title: The First 48 - Taken For a Ride
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 2 In Atlanta, a brash murder in front of an elementary school turns up a familiar name.

programme.title: The First 48 - Killer Contact
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 3 When a young man is found shot dead in his van, Tulsa Homicide retraces his final hours and gets caught up in a web of lies.

programme.title: The First 48 - Mr. New Orleans/ No Shelter
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 4 New Orleans Homicide works the stabbing death of an infamous local criminal. In Minneapolis, a squabble amongst friends leaves a woman brutally murdered in a bus station.

programme.title: The First 48 - Bad Romance/ Out of Control
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 5 In Minneapolis, when a young Somali girl is executed in bed, Sergeants Charlie Adams and Chris Thomsen uncover a secret relationship that may have turned deadly.

programme.title: The First 48 - A Fighting Chance
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 7 When an argument at a local bar ends with a young social activist shot sixteen times, Tulsa Detective Ronnie Leatherman searches for answers in a divided community.

programme.title: The First 48 - Deadly Premonition
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 1 After a young woman has a deadly premonition, the New Orleans homicide team discovers her killer may have killed before.

programme.title: The First 48 - Taken For a Ride
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 2 In Atlanta, a brash murder in front of an elementary school turns up a familiar name.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Triple Murder in Pinyon Pines
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 225 The story of 3 innocent victims whose lives were ended violently and abruptly, how the culprits almost got away and how determined detective work and forensic advancements solved the case.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 Chris Hansen interviews a convicted killer in order to understand why he and his brother kidnapped an elderly Texas woman, drove around and showed her off as their "prize" before assaulting her and tossing her into a river where she drowned to death.

programme.title: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen - Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 When Sheila Davalloo becomes the 'odd woman out' in a love triangle, she kills her rival. The case remains a mystery for months until Sheila tries killing her husband and a dedicated detective finally puts the pieces together of this sordid story.

programme.title: The First 48 - The Stranger / Prince of Darkness
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 12 In Cincinnati, Detectives Matt Thompson and Doug Lindle are investigating the double homicide of a local hairdresser and his elderly neighbor, both stabbed to death and set on fire. When detectives discover that one of the victim's cars is missing.

programme.title: The First 48 - Division / Loose Ends
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 14 In Birmingham, Det. Eric Torrence investigates the death of a 24-year-old father-of-two shot in the street.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Disappeared / Red Handed
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 Now that some of our strongest cases have been adjudicated and many cases have some compelling new developments, we take viewers inside the powerful and dramatic events that unfolded after the arrest.

programme.title: After the First 48 - The Boogey Man
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 On March 26th, 2006, homicide detectives were called to the site of a burning car. Inside were the charred remains of 22-year-old Xenia Wilson, the mother of a four-year-old daughter.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Bail Out
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 In Dallas, detectives investigated the shooting death of 26-year-old Daniel Barron, who was killed in the doorway of his home. Detectives soon discovered that the victim's residence doubled as a drug den and that he was robbed.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Letters of Intent / Family Friend
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 In Dallas, Texas in 2007 Darell Billingsela was charged with brutally attacking and killing twenty-two-year-old Jessica Lewalling in a jealous rage. Billingslea was a two-time convicted murderer out on parole.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Rhode Island Ripper
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 94 Women in a working-class Rhode Island town begin mysteriously disappearing. Cops investigate and discover the dark obsession of a serial killer nobody suspected.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Cleveland Killer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 95 A damaged man turns Cleveland, Ohio, into a hunting ground as part of a twisted plot to exact revenge on the women who hurt him.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - New Orleans Massacre
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 96 A triple homicide in New Orleans, Louisiana leaves law enforcement with puzzling clues.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Missing Pendant
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 97 The grisly murder of a grandmother in the suburbs of Cincinnati, Ohio, sends a small town police department into a fast and furious hunt for a killer.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Last Curtain
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 Faced with mounting debts and his upcoming honeymoon, a delusional bloodthirsty actor casts himself in a role that includes murder and dismemberment.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Thrill Spree
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 17 When a couple disappears from a Georgia beach town, detectives interrogate a pair of gun-toting cat burglars with dueling cover stories, some sordid souvenirs, and a telltale scrapbook.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Smoking Bun
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 A murdered Nebraska woman is connected to three men with hidden agendas—her best friend, her neighbor, and her ex-boyfriend. And a high-tech whodunit investigation ultimately reveals the killer left behind a smoking 'bun'.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Greetings from Yahweh
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 35 A series of bombings and bank robberies have left the usually serene city of Spokane, Washington reeling. The almost invisible sect called the Phineas Priests claims responsibility for the reign of terror.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Cause and Effect
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 18 The Enterprise is trapped in a time warp that forces the crew to endlessly repeat the same experiences.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The First Duty
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 19 Caught between loyalty to his friends and the need to tell the truth, Wesley becomes involved in a cover-up when his Starfleet Academy squadron suffers a deadly collision.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Cost of Living
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 Preparing for her wedding aboard the Enterprise, Troi's free-thinking mother causes trouble between Worf and his son.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Perfect Mate
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 21 A beautiful woman, chosen by her people to serve as a peace offering to end a centuries-long war, falls in love with Picard.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Imaginary Friend
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 22 A little girl's imaginary friend becomes a frightening reality for the crew when she threatens to destroy the Enterprise.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - I, Borg
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 23 Picard and the crew suffer from conflicting emotions when the Enterprise rescues a critically-injured Borg.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Next Phase
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 24 Geordi and Ro are pronounced dead after a transporting maneuver from a distressed Romulan ship goes awry.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Inner Light
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 25 After a mysterious accident, Picard wakes up living the life of another person on a faraway planet.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Time's Arrow (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 26 After Data learns of his own death in late-19th-century San Francisco, a freak accident transports him back to that period.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Time's Arrow (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 1 The Enterprise crew travels between the 19th and 24th centuries in an attempt to prevent Data's death in 19th century San Francisco.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Realm of Fear
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 2 A young Enterprise engineer is forced to confront his paralyzing fear of being transported.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Man of the People
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 3 Troi is drastically transformed when a visiting ambassador secretly uses her to achieve his aims.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Relics
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 4 Trapped in limbo for 75 years, Star Trek's Scotty awakens to join the Next Generation in the 24th century.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Schisms
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 5 Commander Riker's inability to fall asleep begins to show in other members of the crew in other forms, putting the Enterprise on the trail of a mystery.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Uncle Simon
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 8 Barbara accidentally causes her cruel Uncle Simon's death. His will stipulates that she must care for his latest invention - a robot. The robot begins to take on Uncle Simon's traits.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Probe 7, Over and Out
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 9 The lone survivors of two annihilated worlds are stranded on a distant planet.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The 7th is Made Up of Phantoms
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 Three National Guardsmen explore the site of Custer's Last Stand and encounter mysterious phenomenon that hint at the original battle occurring just out of sight.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A Short Drink from a Certain Fountain
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 11 Trying to keep up with his younger wife, Harmon convinces his brother to inject him with an experimental youth serum.

programme.title: Mythica: A Quest for Heroes - Mythica: A Quest for Heroes
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Indentured servant Marek dreams of becoming a wizard. When she meets Teela, a priestess in need of help, Marek escapes her master, puts together a team of adventurers and embarks upon an epic quest to free Teela's sister from a vicious ogre.

programme.title: Mythica: The Darkspore - Mythica: The Darkspore
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Armed with twin maps, Marek and her team race Kishkumen and his horde through creature-infested lands to a long-abandoned underground city of giants and dragons in pursuit of the darkspore.

programme.title: Merlin's Apprentice - Episode 1
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The sorcerer Merlin and his young apprentice must find the Holy Grail and restore Camelot to its glory.

programme.title: Merlin's Apprentice - Episode 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 The sorcerer Merlin and his young apprentice must find the Holy Grail and restore Camelot to its glory.

programme.title: Arcade - Arcade
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A virtual reality game becomes sentient and begins killing the teenagers that play it. And it is up to 3 friends to destroy it.

programme.title: The 10th Kingdom - Episode 4
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 A father and daughter are caught in a parallel universe where the great queens Snow White, Cinderella, and Little Red Riding Hood have had their kingdoms fragmented by warring trolls, giants and goblins.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Eye for an Eye
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 Richie must face his first Immortal opponent when he opposes an Immortal Irish terrorist who is one of Duncan's former lovers.

programme.title: FailArmy Now - Fail-osophy

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Fair Trade
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 13 Neelix's efforts to assist the crew wind up involving him in a deadly narcotics ring.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Alter Ego
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 A Holodeck character's obsession with Tuvok threatens to destroy Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Coda
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 15 Janeway finds herself trapped in a mysterious time loop, where a series of events repeatedly end in her death.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Blood Fever
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 16 A Vulcan mating ritual pits Torres against a fellow crewmember, while Chakotay makes a shocking discovery about invaders of a strange planet.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Unity
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 17 Chakotay finds a planet of unassimilated Borg drones from all over the galaxy.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Darkling
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 18 After the Doctor adds a mix of new sub-routines to his program, his personality turns violent.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Rise!
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 19 The crew tries to help the inhabitants of a planet that's being bombarded by deadly asteroids.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Favorite Son
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 20 Kim becomes convinced he's a native of Taresia, a planet inhabited primarily by women.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Before And After
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 21 On her deathbed, Kes is bewildered when she begins reliving her life moving backwards in time.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Real Life
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 22 While Paris makes a daring flight into a subspace energy storm, the Doctor experiences the joys and sorrows of family life.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Distant Origin
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 23 An alien professor kidnaps Chakotay to prove his controversial theory about the origin of his species.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Displaced
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 24 Voyager is pirated by an alien race, and her crew sent to an idyllic prison colony.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Worst Case Scenario
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 25 A holo-novel program about a Maquis mutiny becomes all too real when a holographic version of Seska enters the picture.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Scorpion, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 26 Faced with a more dangerous enemy than the Borg, Captain Janeway prepares to make a deal with the Devil.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 23
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 23 This episode: Bigfoot II, Wandering Fishman & UD, UD: Fatal Obsession, Threats & Harassment, Murder by Arson, UD, Angels, Lifesaving Sister & UD, Deputy Death, Hoochie Coochie & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 7
programme.desc: Season 12, Episode 7 This episode includes: Black Hope Curse, Pts. 1 & 2, Con Artist Cop & UD and Without a Song.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 4
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 This episode includes: The Man Who Knew Too Much, Update: Sweetheart Swindler, Dark Dante & UD and The Promise & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 17
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 17 This episode includes: Who Killed Jeanine? (Pts. 1 & 2) & UD, UD: Charlie's Angels, Lost Generation & UD and Pigtail Fugitive.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 7
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 This episode includes: Christmas Party Murder, Update: Nudist Fraud, Gypsy Fraud, Drummond's Dollars & UD and Coma Recovery.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 9
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 9 This episode includes: Money Clip Murder & UD, Update: Unknown Arsonist, Louisiana Burning, Epilepsy Pooches and Cowboy Bandit.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 13
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 13 This episode includes: Dahlia/Torso Connection, Brenda's Bunch & UD, Bullock's Deadwood and Dede's Gone & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 6
programme.desc: Season 10, Episode 6 This episode includes: Backyard Bones & UD, Twin Behind Bars, Ghosts Go to Court and Sharon Kinne.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 7
programme.desc: Season 11, Episode 7 This episode includes: Jesse James Hollywood & UD, Rider Down & UD, Bad Dad and Picture Kristen Gone.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 15
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 15 This episode includes: Teen Tragedy, Update: Jim and Tammi, State Department Murder and Lost Adams Diggings.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 4
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 4 This episode includes: Sleepwalking, Murder in the Park, UD: KC Blast, Parallel Lives and Missing Susan & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries: Behind the Legacy - Unsolved Mysteries: Behind the Legacy
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 'Unsolved Mysteries: Behind the Legacy' is an hour-long tribute to the iconic series that shaped future generations of true crime TV, featuring interviews with the creators and exclusive behind-the-scenes footage.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 13
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 This episode includes: Dreamy Disappearance, Update: Gypsy Fraud, Lucky Choir, Brinks & UD and ATV Murders & UD.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 20 A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 22 The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 9 When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 16 DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 2 The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 After 46 years, LA homicide detectives take a Lover's Lane bandit who also gunned down two police officers into custody. Then, DNA testing helps lead police in Florida to a suspected killer, however, the killer has an identical twin.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: MST3K: The Brain That Wouldn't Die - MST3K: The Brain That Wouldn't Die
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 New guy Mike Nelson finishes his training and makes his way into the theater. His first outing is the movie The Brain That Wouldn't Die

programme.title: MST3K: Bride Of The Monster - MST3K: Bride Of The Monster
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Horror cinema icons Bela Lugosi and Tor Johnson star in this Ed Wood classic as the crazed Dr. Vornoff and his beastly assistant Lobo, who conduct heinous experiments on human victims in an effort to create a race of atomic super-beings.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Lost Continent - Lost Continent
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 A military team sent to search for a lost rocket ends up trapped on a mountain inhabited by dinosaurs in Lost Continent.

programme.title: MST3K: The Mask - MST3K: The Mask
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 For MST3K's first-ever Halloween episode, Jonah's crew watch THE MASK (1961) in 3D! Jonah teaches the bots about Halloween.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Black Scorpion - The Black Scorpion
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 Giant scorpions rise out of a volcano and attack Mexico in The Black Scorpion (1957) while the Bots throw a party for Joel.

programme.title: MST3K: The Christmas Dragon - MST3K: The Christmas Dragon
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 All three hosts watch a group of precocious orphans attempt save a dying Father Christmas in THE CHRISTMAS DRAGON (2014).

programme.title: MST3K: The Million Eyes Of Sumuru - MST3K: The Million Eyes Of Sumuru
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch an evil woman bent on world domination in THE MILLION EYES OF SUMURU (1967). The bots realize Jonah is tall.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Wild Wild World of Batwoman - The Wild Wild World of Batwoman
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 15 In this lower-than-low budget film, Batwoman enlists her band of go-go dancing Batgirls to protect the Atomic Hearing Aid from the rotten Rat Fink.

programme.title: My Gal Sunday - My Gal Sunday
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A newlywed couple must prove their crime-solving prowess when their politically-tied parents are taken hostage by a vengeful kidnapper looking for justice for the wrongful murder conviction of his brother.

programme.title: Recipe for Love - Recipe for Love
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A culinary-school hopeful gets assigned to ghostwrite a cookbook for a popular celebrity chef, but the two of them clash over contradictory cooking styles. However, their shared love of cooking sparks a connection.

programme.title: The Town Christmas Forgot - The Town Christmas Forgot
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 An upscale, urban family that can't seem to get along gets stranded in a remote, impoverished lumber town two days before Christmas. Stars Lauren Holly and Rick Roberts.

programme.title: November Christmas - November Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 With the support of his small town, a father's wish for his very sick daughter is realized. Stars Sam Elliott, John Corbett, and Sarah Paulson. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Love at the Thanksgiving Day Parade - Love at the Thanksgiving Day Parade
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The annual Chicago Thanksgiving Day parade has to cut costs or it's going to be cancelled this year. When the city brings in consultant Henry Baldwin to analyze the books, he goes to toe to toe with parade manager Emily.

programme.title: The Shell Seekers - The Shell Seekers
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A reclusive British matron of comfortable means suffers a near-fatal heart attack and decides it's time to get her life in order. Stars Angela Lansbury.

programme.title: Durango - Durango
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A young man goes on a cattle drive in Ireland in 1939 and must deal with a scheming cattle baron and tries to win the heart of a girl. Stars Brenda Fricker. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame.

programme.title: The Echo of Thunder - The Echo of Thunder
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A young girl goes to live with her father and stepmother in the Australian outback after her mother's death. Stars Judy Davis and Jamey Sheridan. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Rules Of Engagement
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 9 SG-1 lands in the middle of a blazing battle between some Stargate soldiers and a Jaffa army. Believing the soldiers to be the missing-in-action SG-11 team, O'Neill and the others provide assistance… until the mystery team turns its weapons on SG-1!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Forever In A Day
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 10 During a rescue of captured Abydonians, Daniel finds his missing wife, Sha're. But instead of greeting him, she attacks him - leading to her death at the hands of Teal'c. Distraught over her death and angry at Teal'c, Daniel quits Stargate Command.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Past And Present
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 11 SG-1 encounters an entire planet suffering from amnesia. The planet's leader, a woman named Ke'ra, returns to Earth with SG-1 to find a cure. But as Ke'ra and Daniel develop a mutual attraction, SG-1 suspects she may not be who she appears to be.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Jolinar's Memories
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 12 Carter's father has been captured on a moon transformed into hell. No one but Jolinar has ever escaped from hell, so Tok'ra technology is used to access Jolinar's memories from Carter's mind…but not before an old foe shows up to foil the mission!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Devil You Know
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 13 During a rescue attempt, SG-1 is caught by one of hell's denizens, who is determined to use the information they have to overthrow Goa'uld lord Sokar. Using Tok'ra technology, the team is forced to relive painful memories…but how much can they take?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Foothold
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 During routine medical exams, Dr. Fraiser injects each team member with a sedative. Teal'c awakens and sees General Hammond conspiring with Fraiser and two aliens. What has happened at Stargate Command, and can SG-1 overpower its own allies?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Pretense
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 15 When SG-1 is invited to planet Tollan to attend a Triad ceremony, they are shocked to discover it is actually a trial to determine the fate of their friend Skaara. Daniel and O'Neill must argue a case against a mysterious Goa'uld to save Skaara.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Urgo
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 16 En route to a planet, the SG-1 are implanted with an alien spore that evolves into a being called Urgo. Though Urgo claims to be friendly, the suspicious team members work feverishly to rid themselves of the creature before it destroys their minds.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Phantoms
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 9 Major Leonard's team fails to check in with Atlantis while on a mission. Following the energy readings in hope of finding Major Leonard and his men, McKay leads the team into a cave to discover that the cause the energy spike is a Wraith generator.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Return (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 10 The now awakened Ancients meet with O'Neill and Woolsey, thanking them for taking care of the city but also asking them to vacate Atlantis. While Ronon and Teyla stay in the Pegasus galaxy, the rest struggle to resume their lives on Earth.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Return (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 11 O'Neill and Woolsey, the lone survivors of the replicators' bloody coup, hide out in an abandoned section of the city. Knowing Landry has an order to nuke Atlantis if a foothold situation should ever arise, the two lay low awaiting their fate.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Echoes
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 12 Teyla begins to see apparitions of ancients in distress and believes they are the ghosts of the Ancients recently massacred by the Replicators. McKay believes he's found the whale that saved him a year ago while trapped in a submerged puddle jumper.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Irresponsible
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 13 The team hear of a great warrior with stories of defeating both the Genii and Wraith and seek him out in hopes of making a new ally. But when they learn this great warrior is none other than Lucius they believe he's up to his old tricks again.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Tao Of Rodney
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 Trying to preserve power by turning off all the non-essential systems the Ancients recently activated before being killed by the replicators, McKay mistakenly is hit by an energy beam from a mysterious device.
